languages.text: "Мне не по душе, как ткачи Кровавой паутины помыкают экипажем. Мы чтим их, но это не значит, что они встали выше офицеров!"
"I cannot approve of how the Bloodspun Web seeks to lord it over the crew. We may acknowledge the spinners, but that does not make them superior to our officers!"
languages.original_text: "Мне не по душе, как ткачи Кровавой паутины помыкают экипажем. Мы чтим их, но это не значит, что они встали выше офицеров!"

traits.locale_text: "I cannot approve of how the Bloodspun Web lords over the crew. We do honour the spinners, but that does not make them superior to officers!"
"I cannot approve of how the Bloodspun Web lords over the crew. We do honour the spinners, but that does not make them superior to officers!"
"I cannot approve of how the Bloodspun Web seeks to lord it over the crew. We honour the spinners, but that does not make them superior to our officers!"
"I cannot approve of how the Bloodspun Web seeks to lord it over the crew. We honour the spinners, but that does not make them superior to our officers!"
"I cannot approve of how the Bloodspun Web seeks to lord it over the crew. We honour the spinners, but that does not make them superior to our officers!"
"I cannot approve of how the Bloodspun Web seeks to lord it over the crew. We may acknowledge the spinners, but that does not make them superior to our officers!"
"I cannot approve of how the Bloodspun Web seeks to lord it over the crew. We may acknowledge the spinners, but that does not make them superior to our officers!"

languages.text: "Ich kann es nicht gutheißen, wie das Blutgesponnene Netz versucht, die Crew zu befehligen. Wir dulden die Spinner, aber das heißt nicht, dass sie über unseren Offizieren stehen!"
languages.original_text: "I cannot approve of how the Bloodspun Web seeks to lord it over the crew. We may acknowledge the spinners, but that does not make them superior to our officers!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich kann es nicht gutheißen, wie das Blutgesponnene Netz versucht, die Crew zu befehligen. Wir ehren die Weber, doch das heißt nicht, dass sie über unseren Offizieren stehen!"

languages.text: « Je désavoue publiquement le mépris dont la Toile de Sang fait preuve envers le reste de l'équipage. Bien que nous reconnaissions l'importance des tisseurs, cela ne les rend pas supérieurs à nos officiers ! »
languages.original_text: "I cannot approve of how the Bloodspun Web seeks to lord it over the crew. We may acknowledge the spinners, but that does not make them superior to our officers!"

traits.locale_text: « Je désavoue publiquement le mépris dont la Toile de Sang fait preuve envers le reste de l'équipage. Malgré tout le respect que nous devons aux tisseurs, cela ne les rend pas supérieurs à nos officiers ! »

languages.text: «No puedo aprobar la prepotencia con que la Red Sanguinolenta trata a la tripulación. Respetamos a los tejedores, ¡pero eso no significa que sean superiores a nuestros oficiales!».
languages.original_text: "I cannot approve of how the Bloodspun Web seeks to lord it over the crew. We may acknowledge the spinners, but that does not make them superior to our officers!"

traits.locale_text: «No puedo aprobar la prepotencia con que la Red Sanguinolenta trata a la tripulación. Honramos a los tejedores, ¡pero eso no significa que sean superiores a nuestros oficiales!».

languages.text: 「ブラッドスパン・ウェブが乗組員に威張り散らそうとするやり方は承服できない。我らは織り手を認めているが、彼らが我々のクルーより優れているわけではない！」
languages.original_text: "I cannot approve of how the Bloodspun Web seeks to lord it over the crew. We may acknowledge the spinners, but that does not make them superior to our officers!"

traits.locale_text: 「ブラッドスパン・ウェブが乗組員に威張り散らそうとするやり方は承服できない。私たちは紡績工を尊敬しているが、彼らが私たちのクルーより優れているわけではない！」

languages.text: “我不赞成织血罗网凌驾于船员之上的做法。或许我们认可那些织网者，但这并不意味着他们比我们的军官地位更高！”
languages.original_text: "I cannot approve of how the Bloodspun Web seeks to lord it over the crew. We may acknowledge the spinners, but that does not make them superior to our officers!"

traits.locale_text: “我不赞成织血罗网凌驾于船员之上的做法。尽管我们尊重织血罗网，但这并不意味着他们比我们的军官地位更高！”

languages.original_text: "I cannot approve of how the Bloodspun Web seeks to lord it over the crew. We may acknowledge the spinners, but that does not make them superior to our officers!"

languages.text: "Kanipi Ağı'nın mürettebat üzerinde hâkimiyet kurmaya çalışmasını tasvip edemem. Dokurları kabul etmemiz, onları subaylarımızdan üstün kılmaz!"
languages.original_text: "I cannot approve of how the Bloodspun Web seeks to lord it over the crew. We may acknowledge the spinners, but that does not make them superior to our officers!"
